short_description: MULTI-SCENE USAGE - EHEYCIGA foam dog stair is designed to fit against the edge of a bed, sofa, or other furniture, allowing your pet to climb up and down comfortably. It's a portable dog step suitable for small and medium dogs.

MULTIPLE STEP SIZES - This dog stair comes in 3, 4, and 5-step options. Our 3-step pet stair is ideal for sofas and low beds (up to 18 inches high), while the 5-step version is better suited for higher beds (up to 27 inches). If your bed is of medium height (up to 23 inches), please select the 4-step one.
STEADY & FOLDABLE: With a 30D high density foam and eco-friendly support board, this dog stair offers enhanced stability. It can also be folded into a basic dog bed for your furry puppy to sleep.
EASY TO CLEAN - The dog step features a removable and washable cover, which can be cleaned by hand or in the washing machine. This saves you time and makes cleaning incredibly convenient.
CARE INSTRUCTION - After removing the foam from the compression bag, please allow 24-48 hours for the foam to fully expand before use. Please note that the inner foam is not washable.

name: Dog Stairs Ramp for High Beds Up to 25" H - 5 Step Pet Stairs for Small to Large Dogs, 35D Foam Dog Steps for Couch with Non-Slip Bottom Grey
short_description: Versatile: This dog stair is suitable for small dogs, elderly dogs, or injured pets, helping them easily access sofas, beds, or vehicles. The split design connects the two parts with a zipper, allowing them to be used together as a 5-step dog stair, or separately as a 3-step stair and a 2-step stair.

Multiple Step Sizes: This pet stair comes in 3-step, 4-step, and 5-step options. The 3-step version has a height of 13.5 inches, ideal for small pets to access low sofas or chairs. The 4-step model, with a height of 18 inches, provides easy access to sofas or beds. The 5-step model, with a height of 22.5 inches, allows pets to comfortably reach higher beds or cars.

Sturdy and Supportive: This dog stair is made from 35D high-density foam, providing enhanced stability and strong support for pets while walking. The low-angle ramp design prevents joint pressure that jumping might cause.

Comfortable and Safe: The outer layer is made of plush fabric, increasing friction between pets' paws and the steps. The bottom of the stairs is non-slip, ensuring stability and giving your pets a sense of security.

Easy Assembly and Cleaning: The dog stair is vacuum compressed, requires no assembly, and fully expands in 24-72 hours. The cover is detachable and washable, suitable for hand washing or machine washing. Note that the inner foam cannot be washed with water.

name: PetSafe CozyUp Bed Ramp - Supports Pets Back & Joints - High Traction Carpet Surface - Furniture-Grade Wood - Cherry or White Finish - Heavy Duty Bed Access Ramp - Cherry
short_description: Comfortable & Safe Access: The PetSafe CozyUp Bed Ramp supports safe bed access ramp use for pets with mobility needs or shorter stature, helping reduce stress on joints and back
Built for Stability & Style: Durable furniture-grade wood ramp includes a high traction carpet surface for secure footing
Reliable & Low Impact Support: This indoor dog ramp offers a gentle, anti skid cat ramp incline and supports pets up to 120 lb for confident climbing and cozy nighttime routines
Global Mission, Local Care: With U.S. roots and worldwide reach, PetSafe delivers vet- and trainer-recommended solutions and exceptional customer support to create fields of joy for pets
25 Years of Trust: Since 1998, PetSafe has created safe, innovative, and trusted products that bring joy, enhance pet lives, and support the lifelong bond between pets and their families
product_description: Give your pet the boost they need to enjoy bedtime snuggles with the PetSafe CozyUp Bed Ramp. Whether you have a small dog, an aging pup, or a cat that prefers not to jump, this supportive incline ramp is designed to make it easy for pets to get on and off the bed without putting stress on their joints or back. With a gentle slope and sturdy structure, the CozyUp Bed Ramp helps prevent injury while encouraging independence for pets of all sizes. Crafted from high-quality, furniture-grade wood and finished in your choice of cherry or white, this bed ramp blends in beautifully with your home décor. The 70-inch long ramp features a heavy-duty, carpeted surface to provide a high-traction path for your pet, helping paws stay firmly in place during the climb. Whether your pet is recovering from surgery, managing arthritis, or simply a bit too small to hop up comfortably, this ramp offers a smooth, safe solution. The CozyUp Bed Ramp is independently safety tested and rated to support pets up to 120 pounds. It arrives fully assembled, so there’s no setup required—just place it next to your bed and it’s ready to use. Its sleek, compact footprint is perfect for bedrooms and can be easily repositioned when needed. From morning cuddles to bedtime routines, this ramp gives your pet the freedom to join you without asking for a lift. Since 1988, PetSafe has been driven by a simple belief: safe, healthy pets lead to happier lives for pets and their families. For over 25 years, we've been dedicated to enhancing the lives of pets and the people who love them, treating every pet as a cherished family member and delivering life-changing innovations designed to enrich every moment. With U.S. roots and a global reach, our vet- and trainer-recommended products are built for every pet and backed by exceptional customer support. From backyards to dog parks, we're on a mission to create fields of joy for happy, healthy, and safe pets.
